songs.title: I Will Be
songs.lyrics:
[Whispering]

Oh
I will be
I will be
I will be
I will be

Silence will not cover me
I will be
I will be

Silence will not cover me
I will be
I will be
I will be
I will be

And silence will not cover me
Silence will not cover me
I will be
I will be

And silence will not cover me
And silence will not cover me
And silence will not cover me
I will be
I will be
I will be
I will be

And silence will not cover me
And silence will not cover me
And silence will not cover me
I will be
I will be
I will be
I will be
